tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE retirement_documents (
   document_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   document_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
   document_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   document_content TEXT,
   upload_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
   expiry_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE RetirementDocuments (
    document_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    document_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    document_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    creation_date DATE,
    expiration_date DATE,
    document_content BYTES
);

CREATE TABLE LegalPaperwork (
    paperwork_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    lawyer_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    case_number VARCHAR(50),
    filing_date DATE,
    document_content BYTES
);

CREATE TABLE retirement_documents (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    document_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    document_type TEXT,
    document_date DATE,
    document_content BYTEA
);

CREATE TABLE legal_paperwork (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    paperwork_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    paperwork_type TEXT,
    paperwork_date DATE,
    paperwork_content BYTEA
);

CREATE TABLE document_owners (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    owner_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    owner_email TEXT,
    document_id INT REFERENCES retirement_documents(id),
    paperwork_id INT REFERENCES legal_paperwork(id)
);
CREATE TABLE RetirementDocuments ( document_id INT PRIMARY KEY, document_name VARCHAR(255), document_type VARCHAR(50), document_content TEXT, document_owner VARCHAR(100) );
CREATE TABLE LegalPaperwork ( paperwork_id INT PRIMARY KEY, paperwork_name VARCHAR(255), paperwork_type VARCHAR(50), paperwork_content TEXT, paperwork_owner VARCHAR(100) );
CREATE TABLE DocumentAuthors ( author_id INT PRIMARY KEY, author_name VARCHAR(100), author_email VARCHAR(255) );
CREATE TABLE DocumentAccess ( access_id INT PRIMARY KEY, document_id INT, access_type VARCHAR(50), access_granted_to VARCHAR(100) );

CREATE TABLE RetirementPlanningDocuments (
  document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  document_name VARCHAR(255),
  document_type VARCHAR(50),
  document_date DATE,
  document_owner VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE LegalPaperwork (
  paperwork_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  paperwork_name VARCHAR(255),
  paperwork_type VARCHAR(50),
  paperwork_date DATE,
  paperwork_owner VARCHAR(100)
);
